body: Well TBH that's no secret. The problem with translating NTR stuff is when most of them are already part of a tank or will be part of a tank, then u get only the 1 or multiple NTR works of the mentioned tank while the rest of the 4-8 chapters in that tank who could divide in 1 or 2 cheating or vanilla or whatever normal or abnormal situation that leads to sex never or YEARS later get or not a translation. That's very hypocrite. This situation can be applied on probably way more than 500-1000 tankoubon over the last 30 years.

Seriously I agree @Disboard The speed at which NTR stuff gets translated is absurd compared to stuff that is actually popular amongst ENG readers. But we're kind of at the mercy of what is popular/TLs translate by choice (usually the stuff like this or vanilla) and what people will pay them to TL. (NTR fans are paypigs, so a lot of NTR TLs are commissioned I was told by a TL who refuses to do them).
Thicc and hot milfs is always good. Just translate this instead of those NTR and cuck doujins. You can resume translating those after finish translating this.
Let the doujin gods have mercy and grant us with a translation!!
Ozy is awesome and have so sexy art. English please!
